full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @008A *, ,(CES RNGA MONG GA-YANG 'GUGS DGOS 'DOD KUN 'BYUNG ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, NGA L HA SNYIGS MA DUS SU RNAM PAR DKAR BA'I BSOD NAMS BSAGS PA'I GANG ZAG NYIN GYI SKAR MA BZHIN 'GA' ZHIG YOD KYANG PHYUGS BZHI LONGS SPYOD NA'ANG STONG STONG PA MED MED PA ZHES PA DBANG GI RKYEN BGYIS MA BYAS KYANG MANG BAS, ,NOR GYI LHA RNAMS LAS GANG 'DOD PA'I DNGOS GRUB ZHU BA GA-YANG 'GUGS @008B KYI RIM PA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA MANG DU YOD KYANG, ,RNGA MONG GA-YANG SKYOBS BLA MA RNAL 'BYOR PA ZHES BYA BA'I MDZAD PA'I ZHES SKAD MDOR BSDUS PA ZHIG LAS GZHAN MED PAS, BLA MA DE NI GRUB PA THOB PA ZHIG YIN PAS SNGON NAS SHIS 'BYUNG BA'I GSUNGS YIN PAS DE LA THAG LHA BSKYED PA DANG MCHOD PA BSANGS GA-YANG 'GUGS SOGS KYI KHA BSKANG TE MTHUN MONGS MA YIN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD PA CAN RNAMS LA DGOS MED NA'AM, JIG RTEN PA'I DNGOS GRUB 'DOD BDAG 'DRA BA RES 'GA' PHAN SNYAN DKAR BA'I SEMS KYIS BSKUL TE, DGE SLONG ZUGS 'DZIN AARTHA SIDDHI'I MING CAN GYIS SUG BRIS SBYAR BA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,)
